statements: SELECT * FROM WasteReports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, waste_type FROM WasteReports;
SELECT report_id, waste_amount FROM WasteReports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT report_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM WasteReports GROUP BY report_id;
SELECT SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste FROM WasteReports;
SELECT AVG(waste_amount) AS avg_waste FROM WasteReports;
SELECT DISTINCT waste_type FROM WasteReports;
SELECT * FROM WasteReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteReports LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_type LIKE '%paper%';
SELECT AVG(waste_amount) AS avg_waste_per_type, waste_type FROM WasteReports GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_type IN ('Plastic', 'Glass');
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE compliance_status IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MIN(waste_amount) AS min_waste, MAX(waste_amount) AS max_waste FROM WasteReports;
SELECT report_id, STRFTIME('%Y', report_date) AS year FROM WasteReports;
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_amount = (SELECT MAX(waste_amount) FROM WasteReports);
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT report_id, waste_type, compliance_status FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_amount > 100
SELECT AVG(waste_amount) AS average_waste_amount FROM WasteReports
SELECT * FROM WasteReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_type_count FROM WasteReports GROUP BY waste_type
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT report_id, waste_amount FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_type IN ('Paper', 'Glass')
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM WasteReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT DISTINCT waste_type FROM WasteReports
SELECT report_id, waste_type, compliance_status FROM WasteReports WHERE report_date > '2022-03-15'
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_type LIKE 'O%'
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE report_id = 5 AND compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT report_id, waste_amount FROM WasteReports WHERE report_date > '2022-06-30' AND waste_amount < 50
SELECT MIN(waste_amount) AS min_waste_amount, MAX(waste_amount) AS max_waste_amount FROM WasteReports
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE report_date < '2022-02-28'
SELECT waste_type, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste_amount FROM WasteReports GROUP BY waste_type
SELECT report_id, waste_type, compliance_status FROM WasteReports WHERE waste_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY waste_amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM WasteReports WHERE report_date = '2022-04-10'

SELECT compliance_id, facility_name FROM compliance_data;
SELECT report_date, waste_category FROM waste_reports;
SELECT compliance_status FROM compliance_data;
SELECT report_id, waste_amount FROM waste_reports;
SELECT facility_name, regulatory_body FROM compliance_data;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_category = 'Hazardous';

SELECT report_id, waste_category FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_amount > 100;
SELECT compliance_id FROM compliance_data WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT facility_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT AVG(waste_amount) FROM waste_reports;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_data;
SELECT MAX(waste_amount) FROM waste_reports;
SELECT DISTINCT regulatory_body FROM compliance_data;
SELECT MIN(waste_amount) FROM waste_reports;
SELECT SUM(waste_amount) FROM waste_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, waste_category FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_amount > 100;
SELECT facility_name, regulatory_body FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT report_id, waste_category, waste_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE regulatory_body = 'EPA' AND compliance_status = false;
SELECT facility_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT report_id, waste_category FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_category = 'Plastic' AND waste_amount > 50;
SELECT COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM waste_reports;
SELECT AVG(waste_amount) AS avg_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(compliance_id) AS total_compliance FROM compliance_data GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT DISTINCT regulatory_body FROM compliance_data;
SELECT facility_name, MAX(compliance_id) AS latest_compliance FROM compliance_data GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_category = 'Metal';
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_data GROUP BY facility_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT report_id, facility_name FROM waste_reports JOIN compliance_data ON waste_reports.report_id = compliance_data.compliance_id;
SELECT report_id, report_date, waste_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data ORDER BY compliance_id DESC;
SELECT regulatory_body, AVG(waste_amount) AS avg_waste_amount FROM compliance_data JOIN waste_reports ON compliance_data.compliance_id = waste_reports.report_id GROUP BY regulatory_body;
SELECT facility_name, compliance_status, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_data GROUP BY facility_name, compliance_status;
SELECT waste_category, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste_amount FROM waste_reports GROUP BY waste_category ORDER BY total_waste_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, waste_type FROM waste_reports;

SELECT record_id, compliance_date FROM compliance_records;
SELECT * FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, facility_address FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT report_name, waste_amount FROM waste_reports;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT report_date, waste_amount FROM waste_reports;
SELECT compliance_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_records;
SELECT report_name, waste_type FROM waste_reports;
SELECT facility_name, facility_address, facility_type FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT compliance_date, compliance_details FROM compliance_records;
SELECT report_id, report_name, waste_type FROM waste_reports;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, facility_address, facility_type FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT report_id, report_date, waste_amount FROM waste_reports;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, facility_type FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT report_name, report_date, waste_amount FROM waste_reports;
SELECT facility_name, facility_address, facility_type FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, facility_address FROM waste_facilities;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_amount > 1000;
SELECT report_name, report_date, waste_type FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_type = 'Paper';
SELECT facility_name, facility_address FROM waste_facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM waste_facilities JOIN waste_reports ON waste_facilities.facility_id = waste_reports.report_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WR JOIN compliance_records CR ON WR.report_id = CR.report_id WHERE CR.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT facility_name, AVG(waste_amount) AS average_waste FROM waste_reports WR JOIN waste_facilities WF ON WR.report_id = WF.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste_amount FROM waste_facilities WF JOIN waste_reports WR ON WF.facility_id = WR.report_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WR JOIN compliance_records CR ON WR.report_id = CR.report_id WHERE WR.waste_type = 'Glass' AND CR.compliance_status = 'Compliant';

SELECT facility_name, facility_address, COUNT(wr.report_id) AS total_reports FROM waste_facilities wf JOIN waste_reports wr ON wf.facility_id = wr.report_id GROUP BY facility_name, facility_address HAVING total_reports > 5;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT facility_name, AVG(waste_amount) AS average_waste FROM waste_facilities fa JOIN waste_reports wr ON fa.facility_id = wr.report_id GROUP BY facility_name HAVING AVG(waste_amount) > 500;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste FROM waste_facilities fa JOIN waste_reports wr ON fa.facility_id = wr.report_id GROUP BY facility_name, facility_type;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' AND compliance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT AVG(waste_amount) AS average_waste_amount, MIN(waste_amount) AS min_waste_amount, MAX(waste_amount) AS max_waste_amount FROM waste_reports;
SELECT facility_name, facility_address, AVG(waste_amount) AS avg_waste_amount FROM waste_facilities wf JOIN waste_reports wr ON wf.facility_id = wr.report_id GROUP BY facility_name, facility_address;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WR JOIN compliance_records CR ON WR.report_id = CR.report_id WHERE CR.compliance_status = 'Compliant' OR CR.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_details LIKE '%violation%';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports;
SELECT report_date, waste_type FROM waste_management_reports;
SELECT report_id, waste_amount FROM waste_management_reports;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT violation_description FROM compliance_reports;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM waste_collection_sites;
SELECT site_address, site_capacity FROM waste_collection_sites;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_address FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT agency_id, contact_person FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports WHERE report_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE violation_date='2022-09-20';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE site_name='Site A';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_name='Environmental Agency';
SELECT report_id, waste_type FROM waste_management_reports WHERE waste_amount > 1000;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE violation_type='Non-compliance';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_id=1;
SELECT site_name, site_capacity FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE site_capacity < 500;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports WHERE waste_type='Plastic';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM waste_management_reports WHERE waste_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE violation_type = 'Non-compliance';
SELECT report_id, violation_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE site_capacity >= 500;
SELECT site_id FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE site_name LIKE '%Recycling%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'EPA';
SELECT agency_address, contact_person FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_id = 5;
SELECT wmr.report_id, wmr.waste_type, wmr.waste_amount, cr.violation_description FROM waste_management_reports wmr JOIN compliance_reports cr ON wmr.report_id = cr.report_id;

SELECT wmr.report_id, wmr.report_date, cr.violation_type, cr.violation_date, cr.violation_description FROM waste_management_reports wmr JOIN compliance_reports cr ON wmr.report_id = cr.report_id WHERE cr.violation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT wmr.report_id, wmr.report_date, ws.site_name, ws.site_address, ws.site_capacity FROM waste_management_reports wmr JOIN waste_collection_sites ws ON wmr.report_id = ws.site_id;
SELECT cr.compliance_id, cr.violation_type, ws.site_name, ws.site_address FROM compliance_reports cr JOIN waste_collection_sites ws ON cr.compliance_id = ws.site_id;
SELECT rar.agency_name, rar.agency_address, cr.violation_description FROM regulatory_agencies rar JOIN compliance_reports cr ON rar.agency_id = cr.compliance_id WHERE cr.violation_type = 'Violation';

SELECT wmr.report_date, cs.site_name, ra.agency_name FROM waste_management_reports wmr JOIN waste_collection_sites cs ON wmr.report_id = cs.site_id JOIN regulatory_agencies ra ON cs.site_id = ra.agency_id;
SELECT DISTINCT wmr.waste_type FROM waste_management_reports wmr;
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM regulatory_agencies ra JOIN compliance_reports cr ON ra.agency_id = cr.compliance_id GROUP BY agency_name;
SELECT MAX(site_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM waste_collection_sites;
SELECT AVG(waste_amount) AS avg_waste_amount FROM waste_management_reports;
SELECT agency_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM regulatory_agencies ra JOIN waste_management_reports wmr ON ra.agency_id = wmr.report_id GROUP BY agency_name HAVING total_reports > 5;

SELECT wmr.report_id, MAX(cr.violation_date) AS latest_violation_date FROM waste_management_reports wmr JOIN compliance_reports cr ON wmr.report_id = cr.report_id GROUP BY wmr.report_id ORDER BY latest_violation_date DESC;

SELECT rar.agency_name, wmr.report_date, cr.violation_type, ws.site_name FROM regulatory_agencies rar JOIN waste_management_reports wmr ON rar.agency_id = wmr.report_id JOIN compliance_reports cr ON wmr.report_id = cr.report_id JOIN waste_collection_sites ws ON wmr.report_id = ws.site_id;

SELECT generation_amount FROM waste_generation WHERE generation_id = 1;
SELECT compliance_status FROM waste_compliance WHERE compliance_id = 1;
SELECT location_address FROM waste_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM waste_management_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM waste_management_reports WHERE LENGTH(report_text) > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_types WHERE type_name LIKE 'Hazardous%';
SELECT type_id, type_name FROM waste_types WHERE type_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM waste_generation WHERE generation_amount > 1000;
SELECT generation_id, generation_date FROM waste_generation ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
SELECT compliance_id, compliance_date FROM waste_compliance WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_locations WHERE location_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM waste_locations WHERE LENGTH(location_name) > 20;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports JOIN waste_types ON waste_management_reports.report_id = waste_types.type_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_generation JOIN waste_locations ON waste_generation.generation_id = waste_locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_compliance JOIN waste_types ON waste_compliance.compliance_id = waste_types.type_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_reports JOIN waste_locations ON waste_management_reports.report_id = waste_locations.location_id;
SELECT AVG(generation_amount) AS average_generation_amount FROM waste_generation;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM waste_management_reports;
SELECT MAX(compliance_date) AS latest_compliance_date FROM waste_compliance;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS reports_count FROM waste_management_reports JOIN waste_locations ON waste_management_reports.report_id = waste_locations.location_id GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT type_name, SUM(generation_amount) AS total_generation_amount FROM waste_types JOIN waste_generation ON waste_types.type_id = waste_generation.generation_id GROUP BY type_name;
